snippet: A video showing inmates gloating over decapitation victims is drawing scrutiny to the security situation in Maranhão State, run by one of Brazil’s most powerful families.
abstract: Series of violent episodes at an overcrowded Brazilian prison, and video showing inmates gloating over three decapitation victims during a riot there in Dec 2013, are focusing scrutiny on the deteriorating security situation in Maranhao State, bastion of one of Brazil’s most powerful political families.
lead_paragraph: A video showing inmates gloating over decapitation victims is drawing scrutiny to the security situation in Maranhão State, run by one of Brazil’s most powerful families.

headline.main: Prison Violence Brings Scrutiny to State in Brazil
headline.print_headline: Prison Violence Brings Scrutiny to State in Brazil
